fulltextMetadata.title: Agreement

clause_description: Infrastructure management services including maintenance, 24/7 support
Client to pay $5,000 USD payable within 15 days of invoice
Either party may terminate with 30 days written notice
Provider's liability not to exceed fees paid in preceding six months

fulltextMetadata.summary: This service agreement between TechCorp Inc. and DataSolutions LLC establishes a 12-month contract for cloud infrastructure management services beginning February 1, 2025. DataSolutions will provide server maintenance, security updates, and 24/7 monitoring for a monthly fee of $5,000. The agreement allows either party to terminate with 30 days' written notice and limits the service provider's liability to fees paid in the preceding six months.
